memberdef.argsstring: (struct ssh_agent_struct *agent, void *buf, size_t n, int do_read)
memberdef.name: atomicio

briefdescription.para: Create a new ssh agent structure.

simplesect.para: An allocated ssh agent structure or NULL on error.

briefdescription.para: sets the SSH agent channel. The SSH agent channel will be used to authenticate this client using an agent through a channel, from another session. The most likely use is to implement SSH Agent forwarding into a SSH proxy.

parameterdescription.para: a SSH channel from another session.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK in case of success SSH_ERROR in case of an error

briefdescription.para: sets the SSH agent socket. The SSH agent will be used to authenticate this client using the given socket to communicate with the ssh-agent. The caller is responsible for connecting to the socket prior to calling this function.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK in case of success SSH_ERROR in case of an error

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_session session, const ssh_key pubkey, struct ssh_buffer_struct *data)
memberdef.name: ssh_agent_sign_data
